divs: Sighting Detailsflew by north to south noticed directly above and it shot straight across then simply vanished. Was not one of the following. Comet, mo trail and it had a light airplane, only if we had created a plane that flies that fast Satellite, see them all of the time, it was not one space station, we watch this fkly by and I have ruled thisout dur to lights When the space station flies by you see it fade as it passes by. This went by at an altitude that was lower than a commercial plane and it had covered the visible sky in a matter of two seconds.
Summary: rounded triangle shaped white light with a red light on top
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Schenectady
